data.title: Our People
data.meta_description: We benefit from a hands-on leadership team, with all projects and teams being Director-led.
data.text:
Paul Boylan

Group CEO

Paul Boylan

Group CEO

Joining Linesight in 2002, Paul has amassed 25+ years’ experience in the construction industry, with extensive knowledge and expertise across multiple sectors globally, including in Life Sciences, Data Centers, Commercial Real Estate, High-Tech Industrial, Residential and Retail. As Linesight Group CEO, he takes a leading role in all market-facing matters within the organization, to ensure that clients in every region get the most benefit from our experience. Paul has built strategic partnerships with many of Linesight’s major international clients, working on a diverse range of complex and interesting build projects. He specializes in strategy and program consultancy and is a Fellow of the Society of Chartered Surveyors Ireland/Royal Institution of Chartered Surveyors (SCSI/RICS).

Paul Boylan

He specializes in strategy and program consultancy and is a Fellow of the Society of Chartered Surveyors Ireland/Royal Institution of Chartered Surveyors (SCSI/RICS).

John Butler

Managing Director – APAC and GCC

John Butler

Managing Director – APAC and GCC

John joined Linesight in 1999 and holds the role of Managing Director – APAC and MENA. Having had extensive experience working throughout Asia, the UK, Australia, New Zealand, and EMEA, he now oversees operations and client relationships in this broad and very diverse region, with a keen focus on continuing to push regional growth for Linesight, both in terms of locations and services offered. John’s experience spans a broad range of sectors, and he has worked with key multinational clients on complex and large-scale programs around the world, providing a range of consultancy services and strategic advice.

John Butler

Managing Director – APAC and GCC

Having had extensive experience working throughout Asia, the UK, Australia, New Zealand, and EMEA, he now oversees operations and client relationships in this broad and very diverse region, with a keen focus on continuing to push regional growth for Linesight, both in terms of locations and services offered. John’s experience spans a broad range of sectors, and he has worked with key multinational clients on complex and large-scale programs around the world, providing a range of consultancy services and strategic advice.

Jane Cassidy

Group General Counsel

Jane Cassidy

Group General Counsel

As Group General Counsel Jane brings over 10 years of varied legal experience to her role. Harnessing her background as a criminal barrister, and encompassing her more recent inhouse experience in the construction and finance industries to provide clear structure, advice and support to deliver fundamental change and improvement in legal strategy, process and compliance. Jane has an acute attention to detail in all aspects of her work. Using logical, analytical and creative solutions to ensure the legal strategy of the company aligns with its effective and compliant business functioning.

Jane Cassidy

Group General Counsel

As Group General Counsel Jane brings over 10 years of varied legal experience to her role. Harnessing her background as a criminal barrister, and encompassing her more recent inhouse experience in the construction and finance industries to provide clear structure, advice and support to deliver fundamental change and improvement in legal strategy, process and compliance. Jane has an acute attention to detail in all aspects of her work. Using logical, analytical and creative solutions to ensure the legal strategy of the company aligns with its effective and compliant business functioning.

Steven Cooke

Group Director - Strategic Growth

Steven Cooke

Group Director - Strategic Growth

As Group Director - Strategic Growth, Steven is responsible for customer experience and service excellence, with this role spanning all geographies and service lines. He drives innovation and technological solutions for service elevation, chairing Linesight’s Con Tech Forum, and acts as Executive Sponsor of its Global DE&I Council. Steven joined Linesight in 2000 in its Dublin headquarters. He has held several senior leadership roles for Linesight, including Executive Vice President - Americas, whereby he was responsible for all service lines and operational efficiencies within the region, and made a significant impact on regional performance and growth. Before this, Steven was Regional Director - GCC, co-founding operations in-region and growing the organization's strategic footprint.

Steven Cooke

Group Director - Strategic Growth

As Group Director - Strategic Growth, Steven is responsible for customer experience and service excellence, with this role spanning all geographies and service lines. He drives innovation and technological solutions for service elevation, chairing Linesight’s Con Tech Forum, and acts as Executive Sponsor of its Global DE&I Council. Steven joined Linesight in 2000 in its Dublin headquarters. He has held several senior leadership roles for Linesight, including Executive Vice President - Americas, whereby he was responsible for all service lines and operational efficiencies within the region, and made a significant impact on regional performance and growth. Before this, Steven was Regional Director - GCC, co-founding operations in-region and growing the organization's strategic footprint.

Fiona D'Arcy

Non-Executive Director

Fiona D'Arcy

Non-Executive Director

Fiona is a Non-Executive Director on Linesight’ Executive Committee. She brings over 25 years’ experience to bear in Linesight by providing entrepreneurial leadership to the Group, setting appropriate objectives across the business functions and ensuring that the Group’s values and standards are adhered to, to meet stakeholder commitments. Fiona has a wide range of expertise from the AEC, telecommunications, software and technology industries. Fiona is passionate about establishing purpose-driven intentional strategies and inclusive cultural connections and collaborations to drive strong brand positioning, great trusted relationships and sustainable market growth. Fiona is a huge advocate for the early education of children and encouraging and supporting women in business roles.

Tom Dempsey

Group COO

Tom Dempsey

Group COO

Tom joined Linesight in early 2021, taking on the role of Group COO. He brings with him over 30 years’ experience in large multinational organizations, working in a real estate function. Tom's key strengths lie in his excellent technical and people management skills, coupled with a strategic outlook and proven leadership ability.

Tom Dempsey

Group COO

Tom joined Linesight in early 2021, taking on the role of Group COO. He brings with him over 30 years’ experience in large multinational organizations, working in a real estate function. Tom's key strengths lie in his excellent technical and people management skills, coupled with a strategic outlook and proven leadership ability.

John Doherty

Group CIO

John Doherty

Group CIO

Joining Linesight in March 2014, John has over 20 years’ experience in the industry. He is ITIL, Microsoft and Oracle certified, and has delivered numerous large-scale and complex IT projects for Linesight as our Group CIO, from migrating to the cloud to designing the IT infrastructure for all Linesight locations. He has a particular interest in Information Security, Mobility and cloud-based solutions.

John Doherty

Group CIO

Joining Linesight in March 2014, John has over 20 years’ experience in the industry. He is ITIL, Microsoft and Oracle certified, and has delivered numerous large-scale and complex IT projects for Linesight as our Group CIO, from migrating to the cloud to designing the IT infrastructure for all Linesight locations. He has a particular interest in Information Security, Mobility and cloud-based solutions.

Richard Joyce

Managing Director – Europe

Richard Joyce

Managing Director – Europe

Having joined Linesight in 1988, Richard has since progressed into more senior roles, including Managing Director – Ireland, before his appointment as Managing Director – Europe in 2019. He oversees the organization’s operations throughout the region, managing its strategic expansion and ensuring a consistently high standard of service. He has established a reputation as a strategic advisor and well-respected consultant on complex large-scale developments across multiple sectors, working with key stakeholders to ensure client needs are addressed along each stage of development.

Richard Joyce

Managing Director – Europe

Having joined Linesight in 1988, Richard has since progressed into more senior roles, including Managing Director – Ireland, before his appointment as Managing Director – Europe in 2019. He oversees the organization’s operations throughout the region, managing its strategic expansion and ensuring a consistently high standard of service. He has established a reputation as a strategic advisor and well-respected consultant on complex large-scale developments across multiple sectors, working with key stakeholders to ensure client needs are addressed along each stage of development.

Niamh Moore

Group CMO

Niamh Moore

Group CMO

Niamh was appointed as Group CMO in January 2023 and has global responsibility for controlling Linesight’s brand story and profiling the brand across target industry sectors. She has over 30 years' experience working with B2B organisations and communications agencies ranging from start-ups to multinational organisations. Niamh is an experienced professional with proven expertise in developing and delivering strategic marketing initiatives and executing insight-led marketing strategies. She manages the global marketing team and is passionate about building a creative, collaborative and results-driven culture to continuously create value for our business and our clients.

Niamh Moore

Group CMO

She manages the global marketing team and is passionate about building a creative, collaborative and results-driven culture to continuously create value for our business and our clients.

Anne Rush

Chief People Officer

Anne Rush

Chief People Officer

Anne was promoted to Chief People Officer in December 2021 and is a valued member of Linesight’s Executive team. She initially joined Linesight in late 2019 as HR Business Partner bringing 25+ years’ global experience in resource development and management. Anne is passionate about championing diversity and inclusivity and is focused on nurturing Linesight’s culture as the company grows. Anne manages the global P&OD team maintaining a keen focus on creating an environment that attracts, stretches, supports and develops talent in a way that adds real value for teams themselves, as well as for Linesight’s coveted client base.

Anne Rush

Chief People Officer

Patrick Ryan

Executive Vice President – Americas

Patrick Ryan

Executive Vice President – Americas

Patrick has over 20 years’ industry experience and took up the role of Executive Vice President in 2018, having held senior management positions in Linesight for over 12 years. Initially joining Linesight in 1997, he benefits from a vast range of experience across multiple sectors and regions, such as the United States, Ireland, United Kingdom, France, Hungary, and throughout the Middle East. Patrick oversees Linesight’s operations in the US, working with major multinational clients and overseeing the provision of our services across the country.

Patrick Ryan

Patrick oversees Linesight’s operations in the US, working with major multinational clients and overseeing the provision of our services across the country.

John Williamson

Group CFO

John Williamson

Group CFO

John has over 23 years’ experience in CFO and CEO roles for multinational organizations, joining Linesight in 2019 as Group CFO. He benefits from broad experience in managing global teams, strategy development, mergers and acquisitions, restructuring and refinancing, raising finance through debt and capital markets, IPO, MBO and multinational expansion planning and execution.

John Williamson
